addItems: Add your meals, recipes and products.
contactsMessage: Send a message with any questions, doubts or comments you have about Veggie Foodie!
description: Veggie Foodie is a mobile app that helps you to keep track of your favorite vegetarian/vegan meals, recipes and products. Available in english and portuguese. Here are some of the available functionalities:
exploreItems: Check, order, filter, edit and delete your items lists.
googlePlay: Click to go to Google Play and download the app Veggie Foodie.
header: the best organizer for your veggie meals, recipes and products.
name: Name
openNavMenu: Click to open the navigation menu.
sendEmailError: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.
sendEmailSuccess: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
subject: Subject
